title: Everglades National Park: Final Deliverables
body: Final Deliverables       The investigator must submit to the Everglades and Dry Tortugas National Park Research Permit Coordinator all other deliverables listed in special condition 14 of the investigator’s permit within 6 months of the expiration of the investigator’s permit. The following deliverables must be submitted:  A comprehensive annual report (both hardcopy and electronic copy). See special condition 14 for comprehensive annual report format. A copy of all field notes. An electronic copy of data collected and metadata (see Research Data Reporting Requirements for more detailed information). A list of all specimens/material consumed through analysis, with coordinates of collection sites. Voucher specimens (submit specimens to the South Florida Collections Management Center).       Download Appendix A: Metadata Catalog Form      Download Appendix B: Example of the Metadata Catalog Form
